data.title: Legends of Lafayette Offers Reward for Information on Recent Break-Ins at Multiple Locations
data.meta_description: Legends is offering a reward for information on recent break-ins at multiple bar locations around Lafayette. See surveillance photos here.
data.text:
Legends of Lafayette, a well-known local bar chain with over ten locations established in the last twenty years, has recently been the victim of a series of break-ins, prompting management to seek the public's assistance in identifying the perpetrator.

The first incident occurred on July 13 at the Bertrand Drive location in Lafayette. A more significant event followed this in the early hours of Monday morning (Aug. 5). Starting around 2:15 a.m., four different Legends locations were targeted in a coordinated series of break-ins.

According to Legends of Lafayette management, the thefts have primarily involved monetary losses. There is suspicion that the suspect may be someone familiar with the bars' operations and layout.

Owner Jared Doise and local managers at Legends of Lafayette have announced a reward for any information leading to the identification and arrest of the suspect. Although the specific amount of the reward has not been disclosed, Doise said he appreciates any information from the community on these recent incidents.

The suspect has been described as a male, and surveillance footage has captured images of both the individual and the vehicle believed to be used in the crimes.

Anyone with information about these break-ins is urged to contact Legends of Lafayette directly or the Lafayette Police Department.
